html:
12.26.23  1:13 am   will i go too insane if i decide to read every single one of the questions on this page?

     not if you decide to. but if you actually do it, it will take such a long time that you might go insane. although that's not what you said, you said "too insane" but you didn't say for what, so now that i think about it your question doesn't make sense

     bonus question: are there any "creative question award" images that you've created or thought about creating but decided were too niche or something like that?

      no

12.26.23  1:01 am   what is the wackiest thing you can think of right now

      it's impossible for me to think of anything wacky at this moment because i'm so distracted by how unwacky this question is

12.26.23  12:14 am   bill wurtz, do you like sports?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.26.23  12:14 am   any tips on how to forget about someone

      learn about someone else

12.26.23  12:11 am   How was your Christmas?

      i didn't have christmas

12.26.23  12:03 am   how often do you experience creative burnout,

     never

      also happy holidays.

12.25.23  11:01 pm   Do you believe that people are inherently selfish?

      somewhat. at least as much as is necessary for their own survival

12.25.23  10:50 pm   how are you doing today

      ok

12.25.23  10:47 pm   sometimes, i find that I've spent too long admiring other works of art that i come to love dearly, and then when i finally make something for myself, i can only see a less good version of something i love. do you grapple with this also?

      yes

12.25.23  10:30 pm   What's your opinion on coloured trash cans?

      i like them

12.25.23  10:20 pm   why is christmas asscoiated with red and green colors

      because of trees and ....... holly berries? not sure

12.25.23  9:52 pm   Where does faith come from?

      you

12.25.23  9:47 pm   where did all the snow go

      into the air

12.25.23  9:04 pm   In your song 'slow down', what is the melodic interval when you sing the words "my hat"?

      probably was written to be Eb to D, therefore a major 7th interval, but because "my" is a pickup note and sort of a ghost note, who knows where it landed. i haven't heard it in a long time so i'm not sure how it came out. i can tell you for certain that the "hat" melody note is D. i'll admit that's probably not very helpful

12.25.23  8:56 pm   how to not spend seven billion hours obsessively mixing my song?

     stop

      i don't know if it still sounds bad or if i'm just being overcritical.

      at this point you have no way of knowing how it really plays. however, if you take some time away from it, you'll know better, at least on the first (next) play through. then, on each subsequent playthrough immediately after that, you'll become less wise about it. whether or not you'll ever get out of this situation really depends on whether or not you'd like to produce other songs at some point

12.25.23  7:35 pm   could i cut myself a bowl of cake, or do you think the english language police would intervene?

      it's more likely that someone will try to give you an award

12.25.23  6:44 pm   What do you think about baseball?

      not much, i don't really think about it. but that doesn't mean it's not good

12.25.23  6:25 pm   is b minor the most upbeat minor key

      no

12.25.23  4:23 pm   Why does my creativity only come at night?

      it's easier to imagine that you are other places, because your local surroundings are less visible

12.25.23  2:25 pm   BILL HOW DO YOU DO (SORRY MY SHIFT KEY IS STUCK IN THE KEYBOARD)

      i'm ok

12.25.23  2:16 pm   I fell over earlier. Have you done anything interesting lately?

      not as interesting as that

12.25.23  1:31 pm   When is the last time you watched the movie It's a Wonderful Life?

      never

12.25.23  12:50 pm   do you think having an androgynous main character in a video game (like link from zelda) boosts sales count and diversifies the demographic of buyers?

      not particularly. i think there's a lot more riding on the personality of the character

12.25.23  12:27 pm   am i cool

      probably

12.25.23  11:57 am   why do you randomly end some answers with commas? 

      that's not random, but sometimes it's a way of implying that there may be other things in the list. this sort of mannerism happens often during spoken speech, and it's expressed in the pitch, in a way that you can hear that it's not necessarily the end of the list

12.25.23  11:11 am   in "the ending" at around 2 minutes in, the "true" text starts rising and you can tell it fell towards the camera

     no you can't. it fell away, although it would appear similar either way. there are optical illusions that demonstrate this, and usually the viewer's brain just chooses one way, and then it's hard to see the other way. in this case, however, there technically would be a small difference because the camera has perspective to it. it fell away from the camera

     from how it looks when its rising but the angle at which it fell makes it look like it fell away from the camera. how?

     it fell back, but even if it fell forward it would be perfectly easy to swap it at the moment it lands, or at the moment it starts rising. however this was not necessary because it indeed fell backwards, and this is evident based on the perspective. as you can see, the width of the top of the word decreases as it falls

12.25.23  9:56 am   you really answer these questions?

      yes

12.25.23  9:38 am   Did you know rabbits go nuts for banana?

      no

12.25.23  8:32 am   there they're or their?

      if it's a place, it's "there". if it's "they are", it's "they're". if something belongs to them, then it's "their"

12.25.23  8:01 am   Do you think you'd like to visit Egypt one day?

      sure

12.25.23  7:47 am   Bill what would you do in order to put an end to all the wars in human society ? 

      i don't think that's something i can single-handedly do

12.25.23  6:26 am   What's simple

      a block

12.25.23  2:06 am   what will you do for christmas?

      nothing. i will however, do things for other reasons, which may or may not overlap with the time period where christmas also may occur

12.24.23  11:19 pm   do you think i can?

      can what? nevermind, yes

12.24.23  10:59 pm   i added way too much flour in my gingerbread cookies. how can i avoid this in the future?

      the first step is simply adding less next time. then the next time after that you can make further adjustments if necessary

12.24.23  9:06 pm   What would you be doing if you weren't Bill Wurtz?

      maybe i'd be you

12.24.23  7:46 pm   Is pitbull the reincarnation of John Lennon?

      i don't see why not

12.24.23  7:21 pm   You probably dont need to hear this,

      fair enough

12.24.23  7:20 pm   What is a special memory you have? 

      opening doors,

12.24.23  6:17 pm   Santa Claus must stay up for 24 hours to go everywhere on Christmas.

     i'm not following your logic at all

     How does he stay awake that long?

      maybe he traveled the entire world instantaneously, then stayed awake for 24 hours after, due to being so excited about what had just happened

12.24.23  6:11 pm   bill how do i stop feeling like i need to be able to do everything to be worth anything

      i'm not sure

12.24.23  5:26 pm   Is it reasonable to reason with reasonability 

      yes, but it's hard to tell if you really care about that, or if you're just going for word repetition

12.24.23  3:34 pm   I consider your extreme attention to detail a very admirable quality. Do you think it's detrimental to your creative process?

      i disagree with the very first component of your initial hypothesis -- you implied that i pay extreme attention to detail, which i disagree with generally, although on the rare occasions when it does happen it is usually an asset to the creative process. that being said, it's also good maybe for the creative process to have its occasional detriments, to heal from

12.24.23  2:08 pm   what did you ask santa for this year

      this year santa asked me for something

12.24.23  1:32 pm   Have you ever stared so hard into nothingness that you've forgotten everything you've ever done before that?

      no

12.24.23  12:58 pm   should people consider themselves mainly unique, or just another cog in the machine, so to say?

      maybe you can be unique for most of the year and then for halloween dress up as a cog

12.24.23  10:59 am   Is shame good sometimes? 

      very rarely

12.24.23  10:17 am   Have you seen Family Guy?

      yes i have

12.24.23  8:50 am   do you think the creative process should be easy or hard?

      it should be a wide range of difficulties

12.24.23  7:04 am   what's life

      movement
